subject: Item Location
description_text:
Can you tell me which sim racing pedal sets you stock in the US if any? Or do they all come from Europe?

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hello, we have stock available in our US warehouse. No additional taxes or fees are required, so please feel free to make your purchase.

So do you know which specific pedals you have in the US? 
I only want to order from the US so I will get the pedals I want based on which models you have here.

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hello, all Plus X models are currently in stock. The Pro X Ultra is temporarily out of stock but will be restocked next week.

So the Plus X models are available to ship from the US? 
Sent from my iPhone

>
